text: 5:32 Mat 19:9; Mrk 10:11-12; Luk 16:18; 1 Cor 7:10-11Adubu eina nakhoida hairibasini, lannabagi thabak toubagi maramgidamak nattana kanagumbana mahakki nupibu khainarabadi, mahakna nupi adu nupa lannahallabani; aduga kanagumbana khainarabi nupi aduga luhonglabadi, mahakna nupi lannabagi thabak tourabani.
